spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations present. Door orientations in the hallway and master bedroom do not match the source. Window placement along the right-side wall in bedrooms #2 and #3 is inconsistent with the floor plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: The garage has been completely hallucinated into a living/dining room area with furniture. The utility room and laundry connections are missing. Wall thickness varies significantly across the model.

furniture_mapping.notes: Significant hallucinations. Furniture placed in the garage area (E5). Kitchen island and counter geometry roughly match, but scale is inconsistent with the floor plan annotations.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Aesthetic quality is high with clean clay-render styling and good orthographic projection. Lighting is soft and professional, though some geometric flickering occurs at wall joints.

detected_errors.description: Hallucination of a living area and dining table inside the designated 2-car garage space.
Missing utility room walls and laundry appliance fixtures.
Orientation error for several interior doors, specifically the entry to Bedroom #4 and the Master Suite.
The proportion of the Study and front Covered Patio is elongated compared to the 2D plan.
Misplaced bathroom fixtures; the Master Bath layout is simplified and deviates from the architectural lines.
